returnPolicy.title: Return & Refund Policy
returnPolicy.subtitle: Hassle-Free Returns
returnPolicy.intro: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you are not satisfied, our return and refund policy is designed to be simple and fair.

section1.title: 1. Return Window
section1.point1: Products can be returned within 7 days of delivery
section1.point2: Items must be unused and in their original packaging
section1.point3: Return shipping label must be used if provided

section2.title: 2. Items Not Eligible for Return
section2.point4: Products without original tags or packaging

section3.title: 3. How to Initiate a Return
section3.point1: Go to "My Orders" in the app
section3.point2: Select the item and tap "Request Return"
section3.point3: Follow the instructions and choose pickup or drop-off option

section4.title: 4. Refund Process
section4.point1: Once the return is received and inspected, we will notify you
section4.point2: Refunds are typically processed within 5‚Äì7 business days
section4.point3: The refund will be credited back to your original payment method

section5.title: 5. Exchange Policy
section5.point1: Exchanges allowed for size or defective issues
section5.point3: Customer responsible for return shipping (unless defective)
section5.point4: New item will be shipped after receiving the original

section6.title: 6. Damaged or Incorrect Items
section6.point1: If you receive a damaged or incorrect item, contact support within 48 hours
section6.point2: Provide photo evidence of the issue
section6.point3: We will arrange a free return pickup
section6.point4: Replacement or full refund will be processed immediately

help.title: Need Help with a Return?
help.description: For any return-related queries, contact our support team:

shippingPolicy.title: Shipping Policy
shippingPolicy.subtitle: Fast & Reliable Delivery
shippingPolicy.intro: At SadhanaCart, we are committed to delivering your orders quickly and efficiently. This Shipping Policy outlines how and when your items will be shipped.

section1.title: Processing Time
section1.point1: Orders are typically processed within 1‚Äì3 business days.
section1.point2: Vendors may require extra time during high-demand periods.

section2.title: Shipping Methods
section2.point1: We offer standard and express shipping options.
section2.point2: Shipping carriers may vary depending on location and vendor.

section3.title: Estimated Delivery Times
section3.point3: Delivery times may vary by vendor and region.

section4.title: Shipping Charges
section4.point1: Shipping charges are calculated at checkout.
section4.point2: Free shipping may be available on select products or orders above ‚Çπ500.

section5.title: International Shipping
section5.point1: Currently, we only ship within India.
section5.point2: International shipping options will be added in future updates.

section6.title: Delays and Tracking
section6.point1: We will notify you via email in case of delays due to weather, holidays, or vendor issues.
section6.point2: A tracking number will be provided once your order ships.

section7.title: Undeliverable Packages
section7.point1: If a package is returned due to an incorrect address or failed delivery, we will contact you to resolve it.

help.title: Need Help With Shipping?
help.description: Contact our customer support team for any shipping-related questions or issues.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Please read these terms carefully before using our multi-vendor application. By using the app, you agree to these terms.

section1.title: 1. User Accounts
section1.point1: You must register an account to make purchases or sell products.
section1.point2: You are responsible for maintaining account confidentiality.
section1.point3: You must provide accurate and complete information.

section2.title: 2. Vendor Responsibilities
section2.point1: Vendors must ensure products are legal and genuine.
section2.point2: Vendors are responsible for fulfillment and refunds.
section2.point3: Vendors must comply with applicable laws.

section3.title: 3. Purchases and Payments
section3.point2: We use secure third-party payment gateways.

section4.title: 4. Prohibited Activities
section4.point1: Selling counterfeit or restricted items is prohibited.
section4.point2: Attempting to hack or disrupt the platform is forbidden.
section4.point3: Automated tools to manipulate listings are not allowed.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.point1: All logos and trademarks belong to us or partners.
section5.point2: Users may not copy content without permission.
section5.point3: Vendors retain ownership of their listings.

section6.title: 6. Termination
section6.point1: We may suspend accounts for violations.
section6.point2: Terminated users may lose access to data.
section6.point3: Users may appeal decisions via support.

section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
section7.point1: We are not liable for damages from app usage.
section7.point2: Transactions are between vendors and customers.
section7.point3: We do not guarantee product quality or delivery.

terms.acceptanceText: By using our app, you confirm that you agree to these terms.

about.subtitle: Conscious Products. Trusted Shopping. Meaningful Living.
about.title: About Sadhana Cart
about.lead: A conscious e-commerce platform built on trust, quality, and ethical sourcing.
about.description: Sadhana Cart curates spiritual essentials, wellness products, and natural goods with a focus on authenticity and simplicity.
about.missionText: To provide ethically sourced, high-quality products through a reliable online marketplace.
about.visionText: To become a trusted global ecommerce destination blending tradition with modern technology.
about.teamSubtitle: Dedicated professionals working behind the scenes
about.ctaText: Discover meaningful products that support a balanced lifestyle.
